import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FileUpload from './FileUpload' import { toast } from 'react-toastify' import { getCategories,getCategorySubs } from '../../../functions/category' import { createProduct } from '../../../functions/product' import AdminNav from '../../../components/nav/AdminNav' import { getProduct } from '../../../functions/product' const initialstate={ title:'', description:'', price:'', categories:[], category:'', subs:[], shipping:'', quantity:'', images:[], colors:['Black','Brown','Silver','White','Blue','Red'], color:'', brands:['Apple','Lenovo','ASUS','Dell','HP','Microsoft'], brand:'', } const ProductUpdate=()=>{ let params=useParams() const [values,setValues]=useState(initialstate) const {user}=useSelector(state=>({...state})) useEffect(()=>{ loadProduct(); },[]) const loadProduct=()=>{ getProduct(params.slug) .then((p)=>{ setValues({...values,...p.data}); }) } return (

Product Update

Category
) } export default ProductUpdate
